alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 6:43PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lincoln and southwestern Teton Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 641 PM MDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Hoback, or 11 miles northeast of Alpine, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail along with brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hoback around 655 PM MDT. Jackson around 720 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Snake River Canyon and Rafter J Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Brief heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
